net.sourceforge.taglets.j2se15.driver
Class AbstractTagletConverter

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.j2se15.driver.AbstractTagletConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.Taglet
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockTagletConverter, InlineTagletConverter
public abstract class AbstractTagletConverter
extends Object
implements com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.Taglet

Abstract base class for taglet converters.

Taglet converters are used to convert from the SimpleTaglet to the standard JavaDoc Taglet interface.

Version:
1.10 (2008/03/30 12:43:23)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.4.0
